flagsdescription.title: 628.pot3d_s Flags
flagsdescription.header: These are flags that appear in the benchmark sources, categorized as to whether they are portability candidates, mandatory, or forbidden.
flagsdescription.flag: Disable reordering of the Cartisian topology. Used to work around runtime error that may appear on some systems at some rank counts.
Define to 1 the Fortran C_DOBULE intrinsic is different than the C_LONG_DOUBLE instrinsic.
Enable support for quad (128-bit) floating point precision for compilers that support it.
Enable support for Fortran Integer kind 16 for compilers that support it.
Disable support for Fortran ISO_FORTRAN_ENV instrinsic module for compilers that do not support it.
Modify the maximum decmial precision in C. Default is 21.
Define the size of (in bits) of a double type. Default is 8.
Define the size of (in bits) of a long double type. Default is 16.
Disable support for Fortran C_LONG_DOUBLE instrinsic for compilers that do not support it.
Disable support for Fortran C_SIZEOF instrinsic for compilers that do not support it.
Disable support for Fortran SIZEOF intrisic for compilers that do not support it.
Disable support for Fortran STORAGE_SIZE intrisic for compilers that do not support it.
Disable parallel file support in HDF5.
